name: inhabitant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a person or animal that lives in a particular place: a city of five million inhabitants Synonyms
denizen literary
city, town, cave, etc. dweller
More examplesFewer examplesThe Aborigines are the native inhabitants of Australia.The city of Ely has about 10,000 inhabitants.Many of the immigrants have intermarried with the island's original inhabitants.It was so exciting to see that our birdbox has some new inhabitants.The first inhabitant of the farm was my great-grandfather, who built the house.
